title: Elden Ring's INCREDIBLE Sales, Starfield News Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.16.22
description:
Blessing and Andy tackle a huge news day! Let's talk about Elden RIng passing 12 MILLION SALES, a HUGE Starfield news drop, and EA Play cancelling after Xavier Woods soiled its legacy. #LetGregHostEAPlay

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Tunic Review! Andy and Janet have both played through the game and join Greg and I to talk all about it. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
SPEAKING OF GAMESCAST: Review Season is in overdrive right now. Next week look forward to TWO review Gamescasts dropping. Keep your eyes on the feeds and fingers on the bell so you can get notified when they go live.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire,FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:08:26 - Elden Ring Has Already Sold 12 Million Copies Worldwide - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:16:20 -  - Best Friends Q:TheSheepWhisper
00:28:30 - EA Play Live Event Won't Be Happening This Year - Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:34:04 -  Ad
00:36:10 - Private Division has announced four new publishing partnerships - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:40:41 - We have 13 pieces of new Starfield concept art - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:52:30 - SPEAKING OF FACTIONS: Starfield Lets You Join Multiple Factions - Including the Bad Guys - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:59:04 - Starfield has introduced its first companion character - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
01:03:30 - Out today
01:04:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam and Tim
